update.description:
L_INT16/32 images had been treated as MONO images. Since L_INT16/32 usually
represents luminance values, it's more reasonable to have them converted to
grayscale RGB before showing them on the topic viewer.

Also:

 - Treat each image type independently in a switch-case block.
 - Boolean isDepthImage is not necessary anymore, since depth images are
   converted inside a specific switch-case block.
 - Convert depthBuffer to std::Vector.
 - Store converted rgb into an rgb888Buffer vector before updating qImage.
 - Move lock_guard to reduce its scope around qImage only.
update.title: Treat L_INT16/32 as grayscale on ImgTopic viewer

content.raw: I've noted that the L_INT16 format was not being properly handled in rendering/Camera.cc. I've made some little [changes](https://bitbucket.org/guiccbr/gazebo/commits/4c90be37c78c57c9f01ce3f7180e6e0c58a42ede?at=default) for the format to be parsed properly and now it seems to be working fine.
content.html: I've noted that the L_INT16 format was not being properly handled in rendering/Camera.cc. I've made some little changes for the format to be parsed properly and now it seems to be working fine.

pull_request.title: Treat L_INT16/32 as grayscale on ImgTopic viewer

pullrequest.title: Treat L_INT16/32 as grayscale on ImgTopic viewer

content.raw: Ian, my intention here was simply to convert UINT16 values to UINT8 preserving the scale. The integer division was indeed a bug that had not been noted because I was not using L_INT16 on my models. I have it fixed now. Thanks.
content.html: Ian, my intention here was simply to convert UINT16 values to UINT8 preserving the scale. The integer division was indeed a bug that had not been noted because I was not using L_INT16 on my models. I have it fixed now. Thanks.

content.raw:
Our code_check script (`sh tools/code_check.sh`) has a few complaints (full list [here](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/61/cppcheckResult/), but many are unrelated)

~~~
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFrame.cc:91			warning casting			Using C-style cast. Use reinterpret_cast<uint16_t *>(...) instead
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFrame.cc:141		style line_length		Lines should be <= 80 characters long
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFrame.cc:164		style line_length		Lines should be <= 80 characters long
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFramePrivate.hh:39	include_what_you_use	Add #include <vector> for vector<>
~~~
content.html:
Our code_check script (sh tools/code_check.sh) has a few complaints (full list here, but many are unrelated)

gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFrame.cc:91         warning casting         Using C-style cast. Use reinterpret_cast<uint16_t *>(...) instead
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFrame.cc:141        style line_length       Lines should be <= 80 characters long
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFrame.cc:164        style line_length       Lines should be <= 80 characters long
gazebo/gui/viewers/ImageFramePrivate.hh:39  include_what_you_use    Add #include <vector> for vector<>
